discoverOurBread: Discover our fresh bread selection, baked daily with love.
aboutText:
Khobzak is a project for delivering fresh bread to homes in Iraq, with a diverse selection of the best baked goods. We are keen on production quality and fast delivery to provide comfort and delicious food for every family.
Our team is interested in customer comfort and an easy, convenient shopping experience.
For any inquiry or suggestion, do not hesitate to contact us!
privacyText:
We take your privacy very seriously. We do not share your information with any third party except what is related to delivering your order. 'Khobzak' retains limited data to improve the service only and it is deleted upon request.
You can contact us at any time to request the deletion of your data or to inquire about privacy via Support WhatsApp or email.
bread_tanour_description: Round bread baked in a clay oven. Soft on the inside and crispy on the outside, perfect for breakfast and lunch.
bread_tanour_detailedDescription: Very soft round bread baked in a clay oven, crispy on the outside for a very popular breakfast or lunch. Pieces: 8. Notes: Very popular.
bread_samoon_description: Long loaf, fluffy on the inside, baked in stone ovens. Suitable for sandwiches or with soup.
bread_samoon_detailedDescription: A long, airy, and fluffy loaf. Baked in special stone ovens to give you daily bread for sandwiches or with soup. Pieces: 8. Notes: Daily.
bread_ruqaq_description: Very thin bread cooked on a metal saj, perfect for breakfast with honey or used for Dolma.
bread_ruqaq_detailedDescription: Very thin Ruqaq bread cooked quickly on a hot metal saj. Light and suitable for breakfast with honey or for rolling Dolma. Pieces: 4. Notes: Light.
bread_shawarma_description: Thin but strong and durable bread, perfect for wrapping shawarma and falafel, does not tear easily.
bread_shawarma_detailedDescription: Special thin but strong and cohesive bread. Very suitable for wrapping shawarma, falafel, and various sandwiches without tearing or cracking. Pieces: 4. Notes: Sandwich.
bread_sukari_description: Special bread for diabetics, made without sugar and with healthy, low-carbohydrate flour.
bread_sukari_detailedDescription: Healthy bread for diabetics and healthy lifestyles. Made without sugar and with special low-carbohydrate flour. Pieces: 4. Notes: Healthy / For diabetics.
